item.title: Admins an mods job (read) please
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“booleanan stupid, post:1, topic:116349”]i been coding for 9years an i only just registered to mopascape i saw the post an everthing all the tuts and spam…

so… please do/dont do, these things:

please dont spam;

please read setion rules or your a faggit;

dont request tutorials(moparscap.org/smf is the plae to search not ask search);

dont advertise servers on moparisthebest.com/smf;

DO make admins nd mods jobs easier by being gd and always do what they tell you to do(bt dont jump off a cliffe or summin lol);

IF youhave a tutorial please share on/with moparisthebest.com/smf;

Thanks,
mods dont consider this as spam please just making your jobs easier and trying to keep both forums in shape.

remember te name booleanan stupid(supposed to mean booleaning stupid like blumin stupid if you get it).

edit:stupid keyboard make me type rubbish
.[/quote]lawl , you think youve been coding for 9 years… your probaly nine years old… nobody needs this spam your posting… you registered 45 minutes ago and you probaly think this is the moparscape site… your probaly another kid just posting in random topics saying “how do i play the game” , and i cant understand 1 thing you said in your topic…
